summary: KubeVirt Excessive Role Permissions Could Enable Unauthorized VMI Migrations Between Nodes in github.com/kubevirt/kubevirt
details:
KubeVirt Excessive Role Permissions Could Enable Unauthorized VMI Migrations Between Nodes in github.com/kubevirt/kubevirt.
